source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_00<tab>789th Order Craftsman Bo Gu isn't the sharpest tool in the shed, a situation he hopes to rectify.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_00<tab>Im Abbaugebiet des 789. Ordens fürchtet Bo Gu die wachsende Macht des 13. Ordens.

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_01<tab>Intimidated by the assemblage of alchemical geniuses working for Zo Ga at the 13th Order workshop, Bo Gu would level the intellectual playing field the only way one of his limited mental faculties can fathom─by sending an adventurer like yourself to infiltrate the workshop and bash their brains in. Seek entrance to the workshop from the ever-sympathetic Ga Zi, and hurl assorted epithets at the learned kobolds to spur them to attack and thus justify the subsequent slaughter.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_01<tab>Im Auftrag Zo Gas bauen Alchemisten und Gelehrte des 13. Ordens ihr Alchemielabor aus, vermutlich um dort stärkere Waffen produzieren zu können. Führe ihnen vor Augen, dass sie selbst in ihrem geheimen Labor nicht sicher sind. Schleich dich in das Alchemielabor des 13. Ordens, sprich <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20A8F030502 /var> und <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20A90030502 /var> an und besiege sie dann!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_02<tab>Some of the greatest geniuses in kobold history are no more. Console yourself with the thought that they were probably up to no good anyway, and return to the 789th Order Dig to deliver news of your triumph to Bo Gu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_02<tab>Du hast <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20A8F030502 /var> und <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20A90030502 /var> besiegt. Kehre zu Bo Gu ins Abbaugebiet des 789. Ordens zurück!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_03<tab>Feeling a good deal more intelligent than he did a short while ago, Bo Gu applauds your efforts to dumb down the 13th. Judging from the self-satisfied grin on his face, you have little doubt that he will be calling upon you again to carry out his next brilliant idea...
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_SEQ_03<tab>Bo Gu steht die Schadenfreude ins Gesicht geschrieben und er scheint sich richtig stark zu fühlen, obwohl sich sein Einsatz in Grenzen gehalten hat. Was würde der kleine Kobold bloß ohne deine Hilfe machen?

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_TODO_00<tab>Speak with, then slay 13th Order alchemists and scholars in the 13th Order workshop.
TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_TODO_01<tab>Report to 789th Order Craftsman Bo Gu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_TODO_01<tab>Bo Gu von der erfolgreichen Störaktion berichten

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_000<tab>Bo Gu cannot stand the 13th, no. Always using big words, hiding in their workshop making booms and bangs, bangs and burns that make big trouble for Bo Gu.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_000<tab>Für Zo Ga Alchemielabor von großer Bedeutung ist! Darauf seine Macht fußt, ja, ja!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_001<tab>The only smart one around here is Ba Go. And Ba Go does not care for us─no, no. Ba Go cares only for his beauties, and for Ba Go.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_001<tab>Gerade <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20A8F030202 /var> und <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 03F20A90030202 /var> dabei sind, das Labor auszubauen! Dann Zo Ga noch mächtiger wird.

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_002<tab>Bo Gu would show the 13th that their wits mean nothing. No, no, wits will not stop you from getting sliced─chopped, diced, sliced─by an overdweller. Yes, an overdweller like you...
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_002<tab>Das verhindern <var 1A 02 /var>wir<var 1A 01 /var> müssen! Etwas dagegen unternehmen <var 1A 02 /var>du<var 1A 01 /var> musst! Du sie spüren lässt, dass sie selbst in geheimen Labor nicht sicher sind!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_003<tab>But Bo Gu does not believe in senseless violence─no, no. So you will break into the workshop, yes? Call them fathead and four-eyes, yes, and other nasty names. They get angry, <var 1A 02 /var>then<var 1A 01 /var> you kill them.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_003<tab>Bei der Arbeit du sie ansprichst und dann eine Lektion erteilst, ja?

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_006<tab>Ga Zi will let you into the workshop, yes, yes. Ga Zi is of the 13th, but cares little for his puffed-up peers. Yes this, Bo Gu knows.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_006<tab>Ga Zi ich schon Bescheid gesagt habe. Durch den geheimen Eingang ins Alchemielabor er dich lässt. Also los, los, jaaa!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_004<tab>Bo Gu would show the 13th that their wits mean nothing. No, no, wits will not stop you from getting sliced─chopped, diced, sliced─by an overdweller.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_004<tab>Los, los, ins Alchemielabor des 13. Ordens du dich schleichst! <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F20A8F030502 /var> und <var 32 ((BNpcName)) 06F20A90030502 /var> eine Lektion du erteilst!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_005<tab>You will break into the workshop, yes? Call them fathead and four-eyes, yes, and other nasty names. Then they get angry, <var 1A 02 /var>then<var 1A 01 /var> you kill them.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_005<tab>Du sie erst ansprichst, damit ins Gesicht sie dir sehen und vor Schreck sich in die Hosen machen!

source:
TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_KOBOLD_000_011Our secrets are not for overdweller eyes!
Overdweller must die─yes, yes, die!
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_KOBOLD_000_011<tab>Wie, was? Hier du nichts zu suchen hast!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_KOBOLD_000_012<tab>No, no! Zo Ga d-didn't tell me I'd have to fight!
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_KOBOLD_000_012<tab>Oje, oje, <var 08 E905 ((eine stinkende Draußenlebende)) ((ein stinkender Draußenlebender)) /var>!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_020<tab>Oh, thank you, adventurer! That will teach Zo Ga a lesson─a message, a moral, a lesson. Yes, no matter how smart you might be, there is always someone smarter than you.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_020<tab>Toll, toll! Da du bist! Alchemisten und Gelehrten des 13. Ordens aufgemischt du hast, ja?!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_021<tab>We make a good team, yes─you and me, me and you. With Bo Gu's brains and your brawn, there is nothing─no, no, nothing─we cannot do!
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_BOGU_000_021<tab>Das Fürchten sie gelehrt du hast! Du und ich, gutes Team! Ich Kopf, du Arm! Unschlagbar! Großer Spaß!

source: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_GAJI_000_030<tab>Bulgebrains in the workshop make fun of Ga Zi, say he talk funny─strange, odd, funny, that sort of thing. Yunz want to slap some sense into them, Ga Zi won't get in yunz's way, nuh-uh, nuh-uh.
target: TEXT_BANKOB209_01343_GAJI_000_030<tab>Ja, ja, Bescheid ich weiß. Ins Alchemielabor des 13. Ordens du willst. Hereinspaziert!
